trans-unit.source: Holds a message returned in response to a method call on a remote object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> class.
The exception that was thrown during execution of the remotely called method.
An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"></xref> with which to create an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> class with all the information returning to the caller after the method call.
The object returned by the invoked method from which the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> instance originated.
The objects returned from the invoked method as <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
The number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters returned from the invoked method.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> of the method call.
The original method call to the invoked method.
Gets the number of arguments of the called method.
The number of arguments of the called method.
Gets a specified argument passed to the method called on the remote object.
An argument passed to the method called on the remote object.
Gets the exception that was thrown during the remote method call.
The exception thrown during the method call, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if an exception did not occur during the call.
Returns a specified argument passed to the remote method during the method call.
The zero-based index of the requested argument.
An argument passed to the remote method during the method call.
Returns the name of a specified method argument.
The zero-based index of the requested argument name.
The name of a specified method argument.
Returns the object passed as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter during the remote method call.
The zero-based index of the requested <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter.
The object passed as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter during the remote method call.
Returns the name of a specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter passed to the remote method.
The zero-based index of the requested argument.

A string representing the name of the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the current method is not implemented.
Gets a value indicating whether the called method accepts a variable number of arguments.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the called method accepts a variable number of arguments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> of the called method.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> of the called method.
Gets the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> of the called method.
The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> of the called method.
Gets the name of the called method.
The name of the method that the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> originated from.
Gets an array of <xref:System.Type> objects containing the method signature.
An array of <xref:System.Type> objects containing the method signature.
Gets the number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> arguments on the called method.
The number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> arguments on the called method.
Gets a specified object passed as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter to the called method.
An object passed as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter to the called method.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties contained in the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties contained in the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>.
Gets the object returned by the called method.
The object returned by the called method.
Gets the name of the type on which the remote method was called.
The type name of the remote object on which the remote method was called.
Gets or sets the URI of the remote object on which the remote method was called.
The URI of the remote object on which the remote method was called.
